documentation.text: @title Vault base contract for leveraged lending strategies

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address[] memory) pure external returns (address[] memory)

documentation.text:
@notice Withdraws specified amount of underlying and rebalances
 @param _amount Amount of underlying to withdraw

@notice The main compounding (earn) function. Reinvests profits since the last earn event.
 @param _maxMarketMovementAllowed The max slippage allowed. 1000 = 0 %, 995 = 0.5%, etc.
@notice Claims unclaimed rewards from lending protocols
@notice Public function for farming Want token.
@notice Supplies underlying token to Pool (vToken contract)

@notice Maintains target leverage amount, within tolerance
 @param _withdrawAmt The amount of tokens to deleverage for withdrawal

@notice Calc want token locked, accounting for leveraged supply/borrow
 @return amtLocked The adjusted wantLockedTotal quantity

params._wantAmt: amount of underlying token to deposit/stake

params._amountUSD: The USD quantity to exchange (must already be deposited)

returns._0: uint256 Amount of Want token obtained

params._amount: The Want token quantity to exchange (must be deposited beforehand)
params._maxMarketMovementAllowed: The max slippage allowed for swaps. 1000 = 0 %, 995 = 0.5%, etc.

returns._0: uint256 Amount of USD token obtained

params._amount: The amount of the tokens to transfer
params._to: The address to transfer tokens to
params._token: Address of the ERC20 token to transfer

params._initValue: A VaultAlpacaInit struct containing all init values
params._timelockOwner: The designated timelock controller address to act as owner

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._entranceFeeFactor: Entrance fee numerator (higher means smaller percentage)
params._withdrawFeeFactor: Withdrawal fee numerator (higher means smaller percentage)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._wantAmt: The amount of Want token to withdraw

devdoc.title: Vault base contract for leveraged lending strategies

earn(uint256).notice: The main compounding (earn) function. Reinvests profits since the last earn event.

exchangeUSDForWantToken(uint256,uint256).notice: Performs necessary operations to convert USD into Want token

exchangeWantTokenForUSD(uint256,uint256).notice: Converts Want token back into USD to be ready for withdrawal and transfers to sender

farm().notice: Public function for farming Want token.

inCaseTokensGetStuck(address,uint256,add.notice: Safely transfer ERC20 tokens stuck in this contract to a specified address

wantTokenLockedAdj().notice: Calc want token locked, accounting for leveraged supply/borrow

withdrawWantToken(uint256).notice: Fully withdraw Want tokens from the Farm contract (100% withdrawals only)
